purpleculture_pinyin:
bào
leopard; panther
леопард; пантера
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 勺 indicates the sound; 豸 (beast) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
海豹 [ hǎi bào ]: seal (zoology)
金钱豹 [ jīn qián bào ]: leopard
雪豹 [ xuě bào ]: snow leopard
管中窥豹 [ guǎn zhōng kuī bào ]: lit. to see a leopard through a narrow tube (idiom); fig. to miss the big picture
猎豹 [ liè bào ]: cheetah
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 豸 [ zhì ] badger; legendary beast
    • 勺 [ sháo ] spoon, ladle; unit of volume
heisig_chinese_memo: Imagine that in the cartoon series the pink panther is actually a pink leopard, and is in a dispute with a skunk. Picture the skunk filling a ladle with its stink liquid and then emptying it onto a snoozing pink panther.
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 貌 (かたち、ボウ、バク внешность)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the badger (豸) holds the ladle (勺) for a leopard
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Imagine that in the cartoon series the pink panther is actually a pink leopard, and is in a dispute with a skunk. Picture the skunk filling a ladle with its stink liquid and then emptying it onto a snoozing pink panther.
humanum_full_description_en:
"Shuowen": "Leopard, like a tiger, 圜文, Congzhen, Shaosheng." Duan Yucai's note: "Tiehu, 圜文. Leopard wenyu." Yi said: "The gentleman and leopard change, its Wen Wei also." Leopard is named Cheng. From the tiger to the sound of the spoon." "Leopard change" means that one's morality is changed like a leopard print. In addition, because leopards live day and night, "leopard hermit" means that a gentleman lives in seclusion. Also, "full leopard" refers to the whole of things, or the whole of things, as opposed to the "parts" of things that are "visible" and "single spot".

The character " Leopard " in the oracle bone inscription resembles a tiger with round spots on the body, which is a pictograph. The character " Leopard " in the bronze inscription evolved into a pictophonetic character with the sound of "豸" and " poo ". Both " tiger " and " leopard " are ferocious among the beasts, so the literature often mentions " tiger " and " leopard " simultaneously, such as "Book of Rites. Special Sacrifice in the Suburbs" "The skin of tigers and leopards, showing fierce service."

" Leopard " oracle bone inscriptions are often used as names. Such as "Collection" 3303: "Leopard Return". Bronze inscriptions are used as the original meaning of a leopard, and the temple is covered with "leopard skin".

The word " Leopard " in "Shuowen" is marked with "Northern Educational Cut". It belongs to the mother of " Bang " in the Middle Ages. Nowadays, it is pronounced the unaspirated labial consonant p and the aspirated consonant ph in Cantonese, which is different from the pronunciation of most Chinese dialects.
humanum_short_description_en: Synopsis: The oracle-bone inscription looks like a leopard from the side, and the dot in the middle is like the markings on the leopard. The original meaning means leopard, and later it is the general term for leopard animals.
humanum_full_description:
《說文》：「豹，似虎，圜文，從豸，勺聲。」段玉裁注：「佀虎，圜文。豹文圜。《易》曰：『君子豹變，其文蔚也。』豹一名程。从虎，勺聲。」「豹變」即讓自己的德行如豹紋般有顯著的改變。此外，因為豹子晝伏夜行，故以「豹隱」表示君子隱居不仕。又「全豹」指事物的整體，或指事情的全部，與「可見一斑」的「一斑」之解事情之「部分」相對。

　　甲骨文的「豹」字字形像老虎，而身上有圓斑，屬象形字。金文「豹」字則演變為從「豸」，「勺」聲的形聲字。「虎」、「豹」皆獸中兇猛者，故文獻多以「虎」、「豹」並舉，如《禮記．郊特牲》「虎豹之皮，示服猛也。」

　　「豹」字甲骨文常用作人名。如《合集》3303：「豹歸」。金文則用作本義，表示豹子，殿敖簋蓋：「豹皮」。

　　「豹」字《說文》注「北教切」，中古屬「幫」母，今多讀不送氣唇音聲母p，粵語讀送氣聲母ph，不同於多數漢語方言的讀法。
humanum_short_description: 甲骨文象側視豹形，中間的圓點象豹子身上的斑紋。本義表豹子，後引申為豹類動物的通稱。

豹字的基本解释

豹
bào
哺乳动物，能上树，常捕食鹿、羊、猿猴等，毛皮可制衣、褥：豹头环眼（形容人面目威严凶狠）。未窥全豹。
姓。

豹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bào］
［《廣韻》北教切，去效，幫。］
(1)兽名。猫科动物。似虎而较小，臼面团头；毛黄褐色或赤褐色，有很多斑点或花纹。有赤豹、白豹、金钱豹等。性凶猛，能上树，善奔走。常捕食其他兽类，伤害人畜。毛皮可制衣褥。也叫豹子。
(2)姓。北魏有豹皮公。见《南史·焦度传》。

豹字的英文翻译

◎ 豹
leopard, panther

豹字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【豸字部】　豹； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页1199第39
【唐韻】北敎切【集韻】【韻會】巴校切【正韻】布恔切，?音爆。【說文】似虎圜文。【陸璣·詩疏】毛赤而文黑謂之赤豹，毛白而文黑謂之白豹。【爾雅翼】屠州有黑豹。【洞冥記】靑豹出浪坂之山，色如翠。【本草衍義】土豹更無文色，其形小。【正字通】豹狀似虎而小，白面，毛赤黃，文黑如錢圈，中五圈，左右各四者，一曰金錢豹，宜爲裘。如艾葉者曰艾葉豹。又西域有金線豹，文如金線。【易·革卦】君子豹變。【疏】如豹文之蔚縟也。【詩·鄭風】羔裘豹飾，孔武有力。【張衡·西京賦】搤水豹。【註】謂水處也。【列子·天瑞篇】程生馬。【註】程卽豹也。　又【周禮·天官·司裘】王大射，則共虎侯、熊侯、豹侯，設其鵠。【註】豹侯，卿大夫以下所射。　又【後漢·輿服志】最後一車懸豹尾。【古今注】豹尾車，周制也。古軍正建之，今唯乗輿建焉。　又姓。【風俗通】八元叔豹之後。【魏志】騎將豹皮公。

考證：〔【周禮·天官·司裘】王大射，則供虎侯熊侯豹侯〕　謹照原文供改共。
豹字的源字形

豹字的起名意思

：哺乳动物，一般指豹子。

leopard
Basic explanation of words
leopard
bào
Mammals, can climb trees, often prey on deer, sheep, apes, etc., fur can be used for clothing, mattresses: leopard head ring eyes (describe the majestic and fierce human face). Did not see the whole leopard.
name.
leopard
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bào］
["Guangyun" North teaches cutting, to effect, to help. ]
(1) The animal name. Cats. It looks like a tiger but is small, with a mortar head; the hair is yellowish brown or russet, with many spots or patterns. There are red leopards, white leopards, golden leopards and so on. Fierce, able to climb trees and run well. It often preys on other animals and harms humans and animals. Fur can be used to make garments and mattresses. Also called Leopard.
(2) Last name. There was a leopard skin male in the Northern Wei Dynasty. See "Southern History·Jiaodu Biography".
leopard

leopard, panther

[Unitary Collection] [Zi Character Department] 　 Leopard; Kangxi strokes: 10; Page number: Page 1199 Page 39
[Tang Yun] Beiqiqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Baxiaoqie [Positive Rhyme] Cloth-cut, sonic boom. 【Speaking text】Like a tiger 圜文. 【Lu Ji·Comment on Poems】Mao Chi and Wen Hei are called red leopards, and if hair is white and Wen Hei is called white leopards. [Er Yayi] There are black panthers in Tuzhou. [Dong Ming Ji] The leopard emerges from the mountains of Langban, the color is like green. 【Ben Cao Yan Yi】The earth leopard is even less literary, and its shape is small. 【Zhengzitong】The leopard looks like a tiger but is small, white face, red and yellow hair, black like a money circle, middle five circles, four on the left and right, one is a leopard, preferably a fur. Such as Ai Ye is called Ai Ye Leopard. There are golden leopards in the Western Regions, and the writing is like a golden thread. [Yi·Ge Gua] The gentleman and leopard change. 【Sparse】like Wei Jian of Leopard Literature. [Poetry·Zheng Feng] Lao Qiu Leopard ornaments, Kong Wu is powerful. [Zhang Heng·Xijing Fu] Choke the water leopard. [Note] Said that the water is also. 【Liezi·Tianrui】Cheng Shengma. [Note] Cheng Yubao also.　[Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Si Qiu] Wang Da shoots, and there are Huhou, Xionghou, and Leopard. [Note] Leopard Hou, shot below Doctor Qing.　[Later Han·Yufu Zhi] The last car is hanging on the tail. [Ancient and modern note] Leopard tail car, week system also. The ancient army is building it, but today it is only built by the public.　Another last name. 【Customs】After the Eight Yuan Uncle Leopard. [Wei Zhi] Riding a leopard skin man. Textual research: [[Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Si Qiu】Wang Da shot, for the tiger marquis, bear marquis, leopard marquis] 　 I would like to change the original text.
leopard
Source glyph
leopard
Name meaning
: Mammals, generally refers to leopards.
豹
形声字。考表意,其形像张大嘴露出利齿的猛兽,表示豹是猛兽;勺(shdo)表声,兼表豹身上分布着小勺般大的黑斑。
豹是像虎而比虎小的一种野善。
哺乳动物,一种凶猛的兽,像虎较小,身上有许多斑点或
花纹,性凶猛,能上树,其毛皮珍贵,骨可制药。
~猫 ~子 ~头环眼 ~死留皮 海~ 黑~ 全~
土~ 雪~ 云~ 金钱~ 窥~一斑 管中窥~
bào
, 的。
леопард
Пиктофонетические символы.
Рассматривая смысл идеологии, он выглядит как зверь с большой пастью и острыми зубами, что означает, что леопард - это зверь; звук ложки (шдо) также показывает, что есть черные пятна размером с маленький ложка на туловище леопарда.
Леопард - дикий вид, как тигр, но меньше тигра.
Млекопитающее, свирепое животное, маленькое, как тигр, с множеством пятен или узоров на теле, свирепое, может лазить по деревьям, его мех драгоценен, а его кости можно использовать в медицине.
~ кот ~ ребенок ~ голова кольцо глаза ~ морская морская мертвяк ~ черный ~ полный ~
Почва ~ снег ~ облака ~ деньги ~ взгляд ~ взгляд ~
, из.
